max.description: max vote (max number of icons displayed)

readOnly.description: if `true`, the rate can't be changed by clicking on the icons

emptyIcon.description: Empty rate icon, used to render the rate value. If not set, a standard unfilled star icon is used

fullIcon.description: Full rate icon, used to render the rate value. If not set, a standard filled star icon is used

vertical.description: if `true`, rate icons will be displayed vertically

onChange.description: callback triggered when user select a vote
